name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-limit
description: The maximum number of arrays allowed for each array length.

name: mapreduce.job.running.reduce.limit
description:
The maximum number of simultaneous reduce tasks per job.
  There is no limit if this value is 0 or negative.

name: mapreduce.task.userlog.limit.kb
description: The maximum size of user-logs of each task in KB. 0 disables the cap.

name: hadoop.security.dns.log-slow-lookups.threshold.ms
description:
If slow lookup logging is enabled, this threshold is used to decide if a
    lookup is considered slow enough to be logged.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.queue.size
description: The queue size of BlockReportProcessingThread in BlockManager.
